ed3 <- unite(ed2, "modality-week", `modality`, `week`, sep = "-")


## Data Restructuring

ed4 <- ed3 %>% spread("modality-week", "measure", fill = NA, convert = FALSE, drop = TRUE, sep = NULL)

#combine the files
